def_en: A poppy is a plant with a large, delicate flower, usually red in colour. The drug opium is obtained from one type of poppy.

def_cn: （英国每年11月某日为悼念两次世界大战的死难者而佩戴的）人造罂粟花
def_en: In Britain, on a particular day in November, people wear an artificial poppy in memory of the people who died in the two world wars.
